title: Herald's Horn presents 372 creature types as raw choice list
description:
When Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, it asks the player to choose a creature type from all 372+ legal creature types. This is presented as a massive GAME_CHOOSE_CHOICE with hundreds of options, which is overwhelming for LLMs and burns significant context.

Evidence from game_20260209_184021: Herald's Horn triggered a choice dialog with 372 creature type options. The model had to process all of them to make a selection.

Possible fixes:
- Pre-filter creature types to only show types that match creatures in the player's deck
- Summarize the choice in the MCP layer instead of listing all 372 options
- Add a hint about which creature types are in the player's deck
